body_html:
@ShayWeissman I think I managed to fix this issue by adding rb flag when opening the file

with open(init_net_path, "rb") as f:
    init_net = f.read()
with open(predict_net_path, "rb") as f:
    predict_net = f.read()

With this, the error does not occur

with open(init_net_path, "rb") as f:

with open(predict_net_path, "rb") as f:

body:
@ShayWeissman I think I managed to fix this issue by adding `rb` flag when opening the file
```
with open(init_net_path, "rb") as f:
    init_net = f.read()
with open(predict_net_path, "rb") as f:
    predict_net = f.read()       
```

With this, the error does not occur
